dict.string: We need access to your camera so you can take and upload product images, invoices, and other documents required for sales and inventory management.
We need access to your documents folder to store and retrieve invoices, product catalogs, and customer reports.
We need access to your location to provide location-based services in the app.
We need continuous location access to allow tracking of field visits, improve sales route efficiency, and verify task completions.
We need your location to help you create and complete location-based tasks, track visits, and find nearby customers or distributors.
We need microphone access to allow you to record voice notes for customer interactions, meetings, and sales reports.
We need permission to save images of invoices, products, and reports that you capture using the app.
We need access to your photo library so you can upload previously saved product images, invoices, or customer documents.
